title: Data Table
Home
text:
Welcome to Our Project

This is a minimal Quarto website powered by Observable JavaScript.
It’s designed for collaborative projects that don’t require R or Python runtimes.
Use this as a starting template for GitHub Pages deployments.

title: About
text:
About This Project
This site demonstrates a simple Quarto + Observable integration.

The site is built entirely with Quarto.
The data table is rendered client-side via Observable.
Everything is hosted statically on GitHub Pages.

This structure is ideal for collaborative academic or research websites where one person manages the layout, and collaborators can edit text content directly through GitHub’s web interface.
